alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 209 PM EDT/109 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Tyndall Air Force Base to Mexico Beach to near Port St. Joe. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mexico Beach, Tyndall Air Force Base, Overstreet, Davis Beach, Allanton, St Joseph State Park, Beacon Hill and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf
